snippet: The Red Bulls advanced to the quarterfinals of the U.S. Open Cup with a win over the Cosmos of the North American Soccer League.
abstract: New York Red Bulls defeat New York Cosmos, 4-1, to advance to United States Open Cup soccer tournament quarterfinals.
lead_paragraph: The Red Bulls advanced to the quarterfinals of the U.S. Open Cup with a win over the Cosmos of the North American Soccer League.

headline.print_headline: Red Bulls Win Battle Of Locals In Open Cup
headline.main: Red Bulls Win Battle of Locals in Open Cup
